channel.title: Julienmartin on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in Julienmartin on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: How to rebase your Git branch
item.description: Contributing code to PrestaShop can be scary for first-timers, because not everyone knows how Git works. By the time you have figured how to properly push your changes to GitHub, the codebase has changed, rendering your suggestions impossible to merge – leading to frustration on both sides. It’s high time you learn about git rebase.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.6.1.4
item.description: PrestaShop 1.6.1.4 is now available. This maintenance release closes 19 issues since version 1.6.1.3 (released on November 26th, 2015).
